items.locus:
p. 1/1-1/4 (underneath a sixteenth-century strip
                                              of parchment)

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

bib.page:
II. 54. See p. 47 and
                                                           plates 29 and 30.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Dominica. III. Secundum Matheum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Cum descendisset iesus..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Matheus se eadiga godspellere.

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Se þe leofað ˥ rixað. nu ˥ sym|le. a on ƿorulde amen.

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Hand of s. xvi has added 'Post Epiphania' to beginning of title, and 'Cap. 8' at the end.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Ewangelium in dominica in Septuagesima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Simile est regnum> celorum homini patrifamilias..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Se hælend cwæð þæt heofona rica

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Se ðe leofað ˥ rixað a buton ende. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: Predominantly English, with Latin rubrics and incipit

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Sermo in Septuagesima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: We willad eoƿ secgan be þyssere andweardan tide

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: on ðam ƿe him singað ecelice alleluian buton gesƿince amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Ewangelium | Secundum Lucam

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Cum turba plurima..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'On sumere tide þa þa mycel mæniu'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ic bidda eoƿ ge|broðra tihta eoƿre mod to gecneordnysse godra ƿeorca þæt ge mid gedylde godne ƿæstma to godes handa bringan þæt ge mid him ˥ mid his halgan þæt ece | lif habban moton on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: In right margin between lines 12 and 13, in s. xvi hand, is '8 Sexagesima'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Dominica iii (deletion: dittography) in quinquagesima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Assumpsit Iesus duodecim discipulos..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Her is geræd

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þæt eal folc cƿeðe be us sƿa sƿa | be þan blindan gecƿeðan ƿæs þa þa his eagan ƿæron on lihte, þæt is eal folc þe | þæt geseah herode god se þe leofoð ˥ rixað abuton ende. amen;

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: In right margin at p. 16.14 is 'Math. 4' in s. xvi hand.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): DominicaI. in | Quadragesima Secundum matheum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body:
Incipit (Latin): Ductus est
Iesus..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Ic wolde eow trahtnian

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: se ðe for gylt mid | hundfealdum sƿa hƿæt sƿa ƿe doð eamum mannum for his lufun. Se ðe leofað | ˥ rixað abuton ende onecnysse. Amen

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: At p. 22/5, S in 'Se' is red. In right margin, s. xvi hand has added '4' to the rubric. At p. 23/17, 'sunne' glosses 'leahter'; p. 23/24, 'blisse' glosses 'wuldor'. At p. 26/1, 'he gesutelede' is added above the line by Scribe C.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): DominicaII. quadragesime Secundum matheum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Egressus Iesus..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Drihten hælend þræde

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (pp. 29-30) Christenra || manna geleafan hæfde se ælmihtiga god mid manegum tacnum geƿurðod. þurh his hal|gan. ære on heore life. ˥ siððan æt heora halgum byregenum. þam sy ƿuldor ˥ ƿurðment a on ecnysse. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: A hand of s. xvi has added 'xv' under 'matheum' in the rubric. The heading 'Omelia' (p. 27.23) precedes the words 'Ðis chananeisce wif' (p. 27/24; Th. 110.10).

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Ewangelium Secundum in dominica

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Erat Iesus eiciens demonia..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: On þæra mære tide

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Uton herran | urne drihtne ˥ þæt halige godes ƿord eac swilce lufian ˥ mid ge leafan ge | healdon. þæs geunne se ealmihtiga ƿealdend se þe arixað on ecnesse amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Hand of s. xvi has added '3 quadragesima Luc iii(?)' after rubric. W in 'We', p. 31/1, (ed. 20.23) is red. At p. 30/27, 'walcynde' glosses 'woriende' (cf. Pope 1967-68, i. 263 'walconde'); p. 31/6, 'sunne went to' in right margin added by Scribe C; p. 3/21. 'þencen' glosses 'wealcen'; p. 34/14, 'cunne' glosses 'mægþe'; p. 34/27, 'iwissice' glosses 'untwilice'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): DominicaIIII. in quadragesima Ewangelium

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Abiit Iesus..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Se hælend ferde ofer þære galileisca sæ

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ƿe cƿeðað mid fullum ge leafum þæt crist is soð ƿitega. ˥ ealre ƿitegena ƿitega. ˥ þæt he | leofað ˥ rixað on annyssa þæs halgan gastes a buton ænde. on ecnysse. amen

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Hand of s. xvi has added 'Ioh. 4' in right margin, p. 35/1.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Ewangelium de lazaro in quadragesima Secundum Iohannem

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Erat quidam languens lazarus..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: On þan halgan godspelle þe ge herdon nu ræden

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ƿe ne durren længan na læng þisne tiaht ne eoƿ gesƿeanean na sƿider | mid þam þe læs þe eoƿer sunum ceorige on mode. ac uton biddan ealle urne driht crist | þæt he ure saƿle fram synne arære. ˥ us þæt ece lif on ende for gife. þam fy ƿuldor ˥ lof | a to ƿurulde amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Dominica in passione domini Secundum Iohannem

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): I n illo. Dicebat Iesus turbis iudeorum...

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Ðeos tid fram þisum andweardum dæge

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (pp. 48-49) þa þa crist | hangode on rode for ure alysednysse. þæra halgan rode tacn is ure bletsung. | ˥ to þære rode ƿe us gebiddæð na sƿa þeah to þam treoƿe ac to þam almihtigan || drihtne. þe on þære halgan rode for us hangode. Si him lof ˥ ƿuldor hisn ormætan | eadmodnysse. on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De passione domini nostri Iesu | cristi Secundum Iohannem

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Drihtnes þrowunge we willað

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ða he þafode pilatus þæt hi hine besetton mid ymtrymminge ˥ þa þruh geinseg|loden. ac crist aras sƿa þeah of þam deaðe gesund on þam þriddan dæge æfter | his þroƿunge over sƿiðum deaðe. Si him a ƿuldor mid his heofonlicen fæder. ˥ þam halgan gaste on anre godcundnesse on ecere ƿorulde amen.

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Scribe 2 takes over at p. 51.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Ewangelium in Ramis palmarum. Secundum Matheum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Cum appropinquasset..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Se hælend ferde to þære byrig

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Se lichama þe is þære saƿla reaf anbidað þæs micclan domes. ˥ þeah hi beo | to duste for moldned; god hine arærð. ˥ gebringð togædere saƿle ˥ lichaman | to þan ecan life. ˥ bið þonne gefylled cristes behad. þe þus cƿæð. Domini scineð þa | rihtƿsan sƿa sƿa sunne on heora fæder rice. Se þe leofað ˥ rixað a buton | ænde. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: At p. 59/24, 'geferrede' glosses 'farelde'; p. 59/26, 'geoden' glosses 'stopon'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body:
Rubric (initial): FeriaVI. Passio domini nostri Iesu
cristi Secundum Iohannem

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body:
Incipit (Latin): I n illo. Egressus est
Iesus...

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men þa leofestan her segþ se halga sanctus iohannes

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: His selfes naman to ƿuldrigenne ˥ to gerigen'|ne. on ecum ge feah. ˥ on ecere eadignesse þurh ealre ƿorulde ƿoruld god | us to þan gefultinnige æfre on ecnesse. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Hand of s. xvi has added 'cap. 18' after rubric.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Ewangelium in Resur | rectione domini. Secundum. Marcum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Maria magdalene et maria iacobi..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: E (deletion: ) Oft (addition: ) ge geherdon

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ aras of deaðe on þisum | dæge ˥ stah to heofonum on þan feortigan dæge his æristes æt foran ma'|negra manna gesihðe ˥ rixað mid þam ælmihtigum fæder ˥ mid þam hal'|gan gaste nu. and a on ecnysse amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: The 'Oft' in the incipit is altered from 'Eft': the guide letter for the miniator is 'e'. At p. 70/4, 'wurðmente' glosses 'gecnyrdnesse'; p. 70/30, 'gesege' glosses 'gehiwod'; p. 72/1, 'blisse' added in left margin by Scribe C.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Sermo in Resurrectione domini

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men þa leofestan. her segþ on þissere boc embe þa mycclan | wundre.

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ he færð | þonum to heofonum ˥ þa ealle mid him þe ny her on middan earde þæs rices | georneð. ˥ æfter eaniað ˥ ures drihtnes bebodu healdeð. Se drihten leofað ˥ | rixað on ealre ƿorulde ƿoruld a buton ende soðlice on ecnesse ƿe cƿeðað amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: At p. 73/33, 'folc' glosses 'werod'; p. 75/27, 'goda'glosses 'gedefu'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In Inuentione Sancte Crucis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men þa leofestan geheorað nu hwæt ic eow wille secgan

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Sy him selfum | þanc þæs þe he for us geþroƿode. ˥ sy him symle lof ˥ ƿuldor ealre his godnes'|se þe he mancynne gecyð hæfð. a on ealre ƿorulde ƿoruld a buton ænde | on ecnesse amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In Natiuitate Sancti Iohannis baptiste

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Se godspellere lucas awrat on cristes bec.

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Utan biddan mid inƿeardre heortan nu | ealle þone ƿealdende hælend þæt he þurh his mæran forryneles ˥ fulluhteres þin'|gunge us gemiltsigra on þisum life ˥ us to þan ecan life gelæde þan sy ƿuldor ˥ lof | mid fæder ˥ halgan gaste a on ecnesse. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Hand of s. xvi has added 'Luc I' in right margin, l. 7.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In Natale Sanctorum Apostolorum Petri | et Pauli. Lectio Sancti Ewangelii Secundum Matheum. | Omelia uenerabilis bede presbiteri de eadem lectione

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): [I] (unclear: missing) n illo. Venit Iesus in partes | cesaree philippi..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Matheus se godspellere awrat on þære godspellican | gesetnessa...

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Gif heort æfter þære godspellen gesetnessa earfullice | healdað. Ac for þi is seo cæg petre synderlice be tæht. þæt eall þeodscipe glæp'|lice to cnaƿe. þæt sƿa hƿa sƿa oðscyt fram annesse þæs ge leafan. þe petrus þa andette | criste. þæt him ne bið getiðod naþor ne synne forgyfennessa. ne infær þæs heofon'|lices rices.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Hand of s. xvi has added 'cap. 10' after 'Matheum'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De passione Apostolorum petri ˥ pauli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: We willeð æfter þisum godspelle

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (p. 94/18-25) þurh þæs hælendes gyfe. Uton biddan ealle eadmodlice þas haligan | apostolas. þæt hi for heora mæron geearnungon us geþingian to þan mildheortan | hælðe þæt he us gemiltsie. ˥ sylle forgifennesse ealre ure synna. þe we siððe | oððe ær geworhtan. oððe geþohtan ongean his leofan willan. ˥ þæt he geunnon | us gesundfulnesse on þisre worulde. ˥ forgife us soþe sibbe on þise læne life. | ˥ on þam toweardan ece reste. on heofonan rice. mid his eadigan apostolan þe we | nu todæg wurþiað. ˥ mid eallon his halgan. se þe leofað ˥ rixað a buton | ænde on ecnesse. Amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Text in Thorpe (1844-46) finishes with 'þurh þæs hælendes gyfe' (Thorpe (1844-46), 384.19). [et]

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De Sancto Iacobo Apostolo (deletion: ) De Sancto Paulo Apostolo

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Godes gelaþung

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ðu ælmihtiga drihten ge mite'|sa us synfullum. ˥ urne forsið sƿa ge fada þæt ƿe ge bettum synnum æfter þisum fræcen'|fullum life þinum halgum geferlæhte beon moton. Sy þe lof ˥ ƿuldor on ealra ƿorul'|da ƿoruld. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: The cancelled words in the rubric are a preceding title. The Latin text at Thorpe (1844-46) 392/27 here follows the word 'geherdon' (Thorpe 1844-46 392/30, Clemoes 1997, 407/214), and the word 'Dixit' begins a new paragraph at p. 97/18 in the manuscript. Ends at p. 99/20 with 'edlean. mid cristes apostolum' (Thorpe 1844-46, 398/25, Clemoes 1997, 407/214).'Men. | beon we carfulle þæt ure time mid idelnesse us ne losie. ˥ we þonne to weldædum gecer | ran willan. þonne us se deað to forðsiðe geþreatað. Ðu ælmihtiga drihten gemilt | sa us synfullum. ˥ urne forsið swa gefada þæt we gebettum synnum æfter þisum fræcen | fullum life þinum halgum geferlæhte beon moton. Sy þe lof ˥ wuldor on ealra worul | da woruld. Amen'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Passio beate Margarete uirginis et martyris.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body:
æ (deletion: ) E
 (addition: ) fter drihtnes þrowunge.

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ heo on heofone rice gebrohton. ˥ nu hi si mid gode ˥ mid eallum | his halgum. ˥ þær hi ƿunað nu. ˥ æfre ƿunian sceal in ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld | a buton ænde. Amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Passio Sancti Laurentii martyris

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: On decies dæge

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ðæs freolstid gesƿutelað þæs andƿearde dæg ealre | geleaffulre gelaþunge þæt he us geþingie to þam heofonlice cyninge for þæs | naman he þroƿode mid kene mode manigfealde tihtrega, mid þan he or'|forhlice on ecnesse ƿuldrað abutan ænde Amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In Decollatione Sancti Iohannis | Baptiste. Secundum Marcum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Misit herodes..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Marcus se godspellere awrat on cristes boc

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ðes Dæg. ˥ þis lif is | behaten rihtƿisum cristenum. to þam us gelæde se mildheorta drihten. se þe leofað ˥ | rixað mid fæder ˥ mid halgum gaste a buton ende. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Incipit: Large, square red 'M' of 'Marcus' encloses smaller red 'M' of 'Misit'. Hand of s. xvi has added 'cap [..] (unclear:?) ' in right margin, line 12.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Hec est hystoria Sancti | Egidii abbatis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Se eadiga egidius wæs geboren of swiðe | wurðfullum mannum

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ his ængla ƿyrd to bege'|anne. ˥ hi hio geferoden mid sangum up to heofonum. ˥ hio geoffrodon ure drihtene | se þe leofað ˥ rixað mid his sune ˥ mid þam halgan gaste an god on ealra ƿorulda | ƿoruld a butan ænde amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Sermo de natiuitate Sancte Marie matris | domini. vi. idus Septembris

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men þa leofestan we synd gemynegode

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ be us gelæde to þam| ecan lufe. þam se ƿuldor ˥ ƿurðment a to ƿeorulde amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In Annuntiatione Sancte Marie

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Missus est gabri'h'el..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men þa leofestan ure se ælmihtiga sceppend

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: se þe geƿalt | ealra þinga mid fæder. ˥ mid þan halgan gaste. a'buton ecnesse. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Hand of s. xvi has added 'Luk I' in right margin at p. 141/19.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In Festiuitate Sancti Michaelis Archangeli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: 'Manegum 'i's cuð'

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þæt is | gedon be doges fandunge. þæt se mære heofonlice engel beo syngallice cristenre | manna gefylta on eorþan. ˥ þingere on heofonum to þam ealmihtigan gode. | Se þe leofað ˥ rixað abuton ecnesse amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: The title Euangelium and Latin text in Clemoes (1997), 469/133-35 are omitted here.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In festiuitate omnium sanctorum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (p. 151/1) Halige lareowas ræddon

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: sƿa hƿæt sƿa ƿe on oðrum freoldagum eal'|les geares ymbrines for mænniscre tyddernesse hƿonlicor gefyldon ˥ carful'|lica hogian þæt ƿe to þære ecan freolstide becuman.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Red G in 'Godes', p. 151/11 (Thorpe 1844-46, 538/23) begins a paragraph headed 'Sermo', p. 151/10.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Ewangelium. In festiuitate | omnium Sanctorum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Videns Iesus turbas..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Ðæt halige godspell þe nu litle ær

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Seo ƿuldor ˥ lof hælendum criste. Se ðe is | angin ˥ ænde sceppend ˥ alesend ealre halgene. mid fæder ˥ mid halgum gaste | a on ecenesse. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Red 'S' in 'Se', p. 154/23 (Thorpe 1844-46, 548/17). Hand of s. xvi has added 'Math [...] (unclear: ) ' in right margin at p. 154/7.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In Natale Sancti Clementis pape 7 martyris

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men þa leofestan eower geleafa beoð þe trumra

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Se soða drihten us ahredde fram eallum frecednessum. ˥ to þam ecan | life gelæde. se þe leofað ˥ rixað a butan ende amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Red 'O' in 'Oft', p. 160/25.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In Natale Sancti Andree Apostoli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Ambulans Iesus...

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Crist on sumere | tide

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Sy þam metodan drihtne ƿurðment ˥ lof á on ecnesse amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: At p. 167/13, the rubric Passio Sancti Andree apostoli is preceded by the words after 'gefylle' (Thorpe 1844-46, 586/27), 'We hæbbeð nu | gesæd þis godspell sceortlice. Nu wille we eow secgan hu se apostol andreas þe we nu | todæg wurþiað his agen lif sealde for cristes geleafan for þære lare þe he | bodode', p. 167/10-13. Red 'S' in 'Se', p. 167/13 (Thorpe 1844-46, 586/29). Hand of s. xvi has added 'Math 4' in right margin following main rubric.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Hic incipit prologus de Sancto Nicholao episcopo 7 | confessore

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Þitoðlice ælc þære wyrhta..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Se eadige nicholaus of æþelan cynne wærð up asprungan

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ða cnihtes dyden þa eal sƿa se godes mann heo be bead foran þa | ongean to þære burh constantinapolim blitsigende on drihtene. ˥ on þone halgan| nicolae

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Sermo de Apostolis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Ðes apostolica freolsdæg

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (pp. 187-88) ƿitod|lice gis ƿe þæs biddað þe us to ecere hælþe fremað. us getyþað þæs se goda ˥ se heofenlica || fæder þurh his sunu þe mid gim lieofað ˥ rixiað á on ecnessa þæs halgan gastes on alra | ƿorula ƿoruld amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De ewangelistis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Se hælende geceas him to eacan

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ge læde us to þan ecan life þider þe he us gelaþode þurh hi ˥ þurh | heora æftergangen. Sy him selfe lof ˥ ƿuldor alra his ƿeldæda amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De martyribus

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Cum audieritis..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Se hælende forsæde

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Se almihtiga god be | sƿincð tironian þreað þa þa he lufað. þæt he þurh þa hƿilƿændlican gesƿæncennesse ƿuldor| fulle becinnon to þan ecan life þe he ær middaneardes frymþe his geleaffullum | gegearcode. Si him ƿuldor ˥ ƿurðment on alra ƿurolda ƿorulda. amen

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Rubric partially obscured in margin.

notes.head: Rubric

notes.head: Incipit

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Vre drihten sede þis bispel

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Sy lof þan hlaforde þe leofað on ecenesse æfre buton an|ginne on ændeleasan mægenþrymme. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.body: Matheus se godspellere awrat þis halige bispel

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ þa þa openiað heora heorta eage|ne to geseonne godes rice. onþan he leofað ˥ rixiað ááon ecednesse amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: A hand of s. xvi has added 'Math 25' at p. 199.17.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In left margin.De inclusis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Sum deofel gast sæde sumen ancre.. ne mid idelnesse

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Beþænce se man hine. þe hi selfes reclið forþon se man þe | hefene rice secen ƿile. he hit sceal secan mid sƿince. ˥ naht mid eðnesse. ne unidelnesse.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Text is a quire filler.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Sermo quando uolueris de temporibus

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Þe willað eow seggan sume swutelunge

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Se þe leofað ˥ rixat mid his leofan suna ˥ þam halgum gaste | on ealre ƿorulde ƿorulda buton ælcum ende amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: At p. 205/9, 'mildheornesse' [sic] glosses 'arfestnysse', 'manne' glosses 'heap' p. 208/28, 'hersumnese' glosses 'beggungu' p. 209/9 and 13, 'rihtwisen' glosses 'arfæsten'.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: [ S] (unclear: missing) e hælend cwæð to his leorningcnihtum. Hwylc eower is

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þæt gedoð me sylfum. Se ðe levað and rixað mid fæder ˥ mid halgum gaste á. buton | ende. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Initial 'S' of 'Se' is omitted. At p. 214/16, 'formete' glosses 'formittrum'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Sermo in letania maiore

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men þa leofestan us geðauenað ærest

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ þær is ece gesælignisse mid fæder. ˥ mid þam suna. ˥ mid þam haligan | gaste á buton ende. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Alius sermo Feria III in Rogationibus

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Mine gebroðra þa leofestan. þis syndon halige dagas

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: mid þam ece fæder. ˥ mid þam | efenecan sunu. ˥ mid his þam efenecan haligan gaste on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld | á buton ende amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: At MS. p. 220/2, 'þolian' glosses 'aræfnian'; p. 220/9, 'bugon' glosses 'geðeodd'; p. 220/10, 'gefyrred' glosses 'geelfremed'; p. 220/15, 'bygd' glosses 'geðeodað'; p. 220/19, 'cnoceþ' glosses 'cnyst'; p. 220/26, 'wræðað' glosses 'geabyligað'; p. 220/26, 'ealle þe hi lufiad on heoras lifes ende' glosses 'ælcne þæræ þe hi oð heora yte'; p. 221/1, 'luran' glosses 'forspildan'; p. 221/20-21, 'luua(?) on his geleafa' glosses 'geþungennysse his geþeahtes'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): In uigilia Ascensionis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men þa leofestan þis syndon halige dagas ˥ gastlice þenunge mid mannum.

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ þa egelice stoƿa helle ƿites. þær ealle deo|fle on ƿuniað. Ac þæt ƿe migon ˥ moton his þa mucclan mildheortneysse geear|nian. ˥ mid him ˥ mid eallum his halgum ƿunian. ˥ eadian. abuton ende amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Explicit

notes.head: Incipit

notes.head: Explicit

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ic beo mid eoƿ eallum dagum. oð ðissere ƿorulde geendunge. | Se ðe leofað ˥ rixað mid þam halgum gaste a onecnys|se amen.

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: sƿa þæt hi settað heora handan ofer geleaddullum manum ˥ bid|dað ˥ rixað a buton ende amen

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Se ðe leofað ˥ rixað on ecenesse mid þan elmihtigan feder. ˥ þan halgan | gaste hi þreo on anre godcundnesse ƿunigende butan anginne ˥ ende | a to ƿorulde amen.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Se helende sede þis bispel

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Uton biddan þone ælmihtigan drihten þæt he us gebringe to his ecan | gebeorscipe se ðe þurh his tocyme us þær to gelaðode

notes.head: Text Language

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Geleafful|lum mannum mæg beon mycel truƿa ˥ hopa to þam mænniscu criste se þe is ure | mundbora ˥ dema þe leofað ˥ rixað mide fæder on ancnysse þæ haligan gastes | on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld á buton ende. amen.

notes.head: Explicit

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: gif hit crist sylf us nevehete. ˥ forði to middan|earde geƿænde þæt he us to him gesette. Si his ƿuldor ˥ lof mid fæder ˥ halgum gaste. on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld. amen.

notes.head: Incipit

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: On sumere tide wæs se hælend farende

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ urne forðtid | sƿa gefada þæt ƿe gebettum synnum; æfter þysum fræcenfullum life; þinum halgum gefer|lahte beon mote. Sy þe lof ˥ ƿuldor on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body:
Incipit (Latin): Dixit
Iesus ad quosdam...

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Drihten sæde þis bigspell

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ge unne eoƿ se ælmihtiga. þurh his mægen þrymme. | on ðyssere ƿorulde gesundfulnesse. ˥ soðre eadmodnysse. ˥ eoƿ a hebbe to his | heofonlice rice. se ðe ana geƿilt ealra gesceafta þe leofað amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: A hand of s. xvi has added 'xj post | Trinit | Luk. 18 | ' at p. 273/11-12, right margin.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Ewangelium | in dominica

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Nemo potest...

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Drihten cwæð on sume timan

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: God us gerihtlæce | ˥ to ðan ece life gelæde sƿa sƿa he behet þan hine lufiað. Sy him ƿuldor | ˥ ƿurð mynt on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Hwæt wille we secgan ymbe marian gebyrdtide |

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þi ƿe hit lætað unræd | nege bera þyf naht þarto buton for ydelnesse

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: The words 'ne gebera þys naht þaer to. buton for ydelnesse' follow immediately.

notes.head: Incipit

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Ure drihten. ferde

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ þam | halgan gaste. Se ðe æfre is of heom bam hi dry an ælmihtig god untodæledlic. á | on ecnysse rixiende amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body:
Incipit (Latin): Loquebatur
Iesus..

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Drihten wæs sprecende

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: middan eardes þe lufiendum. þu þe leofast ˥ rixast | mid þam ecan fæder ˥ halgum gaste on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld a onecennysse amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Red 'L', red 'D'. A hand of s. xvi has added '20 post Trinit | Math 22 | ' in right margin of p. 283/11-12.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Sermo de memoria sanctorum quando uolueris

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): Ego sum alfa. et o...

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Ðæt is on ænglisc. ic eom angin

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ƿe magon þurh godes fylst þa feondlican leahtras mid ge | campe ofer ƿinnan gif ƿe kenlice feohtað. ˥ habban us on ende þone ecean | ƿurðment á mid gode flyfum. gif ƿe sƿincað nu her.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Sermo de duodecim | Abusiuis Secundum disputationem sancti Cypriani

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Nu synd twelf | abusiua. þæt synd twelf unþeawas

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: þæt he ure saƿla underfo þe hi asende to þam lichaman Si him | á ƿuldor ˥ ƿurðment. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De doctrina apostolica

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: On manega wisan lærð godes lar

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: And se ðe | hopað to criste becumð to mitesunge. huru on domes dæge for ðæs | hælendes godnysse. Se us gelæde to ðan ecan lufe. Amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De falsis diis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (p. 307/1) Fratres dilectissimi diuina scriptura…

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Eala ge gebroðra þa leofostan þæt godcundæ gewrit

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Sƿa micelne ƿurðmynt forgeaf se mild heorta | drihten his haldum þegnum þæt he het hi godas. ac nan man næfð sƿa ðeah | nane mihte þurh hine sylfne buton ofðan anum gode þe ealle ðincg gesce|op. þam ƿuldor ˥ lof ato ƿorulde Amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Interrogationes Siwlfi presbiteri

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Sum geðungen lareow

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Hella ƿe na | sƿiðor emde ðis sprecan foðanðe ƿe habbað þa nyd be hefestan axunga| nu aƿritene.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Dominica in quinquagesima.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: On þissere wucan on wodnosdæg

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Si him a ƿuldor on ecnesse Amen. Ƿe sædon | nu þis spel foþanðe her bið læs manna on ƿodnes dæg ˥ eoƿ gebrod. þæt ge beon ge | serifene on ðissere ƿucan. oððe huru on þussere oððre.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): De oratione moysi in me | dia quadragesima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body:
æ (deletion: ) E
 (addition: ) fter þan ðe moyses se mæra heretoga | of aegipta lande

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: ˥ he ana is deor ƿurðra þone þa deora mad | mas. þæt is se ƿisdom. þæt mann ƿislice libbe ˥ his dæda gefarige to his drihtnes ƿillan | þæt he edlean underfo on þam ecan life. Amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Guide letter of the initial letter in the incipit is 'æ', but the red letter is 'E'.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial):

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): [E] (unclear: missing) x auctoritate dei patris omnipotentis. et filii. et spiritus sancti…

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (p. 339.3) [M] (unclear: missing) en þa leofestan geherað hwæt þeos boc segþ. Mid ealdorlicnesse ælmihtiges godes

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Eall folc cƿeðe soð hit si. geƿurþe þæt.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: In left margin, p. 338/16, title supplied in s. xiv hand: 'Excomunicationis formula'. Blank space at p. 339/27-34.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Quomodo Acitofel ˥ multi aiii laqueo se suspenderunt

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Is nu eac to witenne

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ge scylde us se sceppend þ gesceop | us to mannum. ƿið þæs deofles sƿicdom þe syrƿð emde us. ˥ us mildheortlice ge|læde to þam ecan life. on þam is ece ƿuldor on ealra ƿorul. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Kalens Augusti Passio Sanctorum Machabeorum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Efter þam þe alexander

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Si ƿuldor ˥ lof þam ƿelƿillendan gode. á on ec'|nesse ƿe cƿeþæð. amen.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Divided into ten numbered sections, though section XI ofSkeat (1881-1900) is not numbered here.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Qui sint Oratores. Laboratores. Bellatores

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Is swa þeah to witenne

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Hæs nan halif fodes þeoƿa, æfter þæs | hælendes þroƿunge. þe æfre ongefeohte his handa ƿolde afylan. ac hi forbæ|ron ehtnesse aleafra cƿellera. ˥ heora lif sealdon. mid unsceþþinesse for godes | geleafan. ˥ hi mid gode nu libbað forþanþe hi furþon noldon. ænefitgel | acƿellan

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): Incipit de iudith quomodo interfecit olofernem

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Þ e secgað nu ærest

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: Ends imperfectly '˥ god þe gestrangode for þære clænnesse' (Assmann 1889, 1. 393).

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Columns:
notes.body: Columns: 1

notes.head: Written Lines:
notes.body: Written Lines: 34-35

notes.head: Overview:
notes.body: Overview: Single column writing grid with 34 lines per page usually, but 35 in Quire XI. Pencil ruling, done before folding, with single vertical and two horizontal bounding lines at top and bottom (penultimate and ultimate horizontal lines ruled).

objectDesc.support: Parchment. Pages i-iv and 363-66 are paper flyleaves of s. xx; pp. v-viii are s. xvi parchment. Leaves are arranged HHFF.
objectDesc.extent:
ca. 260 mm x ca. 196 mm (dimensions of all - size of leaves).
213-203 mm x 149-138 mm (dimensions of all - size of written space).

accompanying: Added flyleaves of a printed edition of a Latin text at the beginning and the end of the manuscript.

history.origin: Almost certainly attributable to Rochester Cathedral Priory.
history.provenance: While the origin of this manuscript is probably Rochester, nothing is known of its subsequent medieval history. It was in Archbishop Parker's possession after 1565 when he labelled it 'Homiliarum Saxonicarum Liber Nonus' (S. 17).
history.acquisition: Parker bequeathed it to Corpus Christi College in his Indenture of 1575.

admin: Manuscript described by Takako Kato, Hollie Morgan and Owen Roberson, completed by Elaine Treharne (2012; 13).
